resources.string: Password cannot be less than 8 characters!

Seleksi Nasional Berdasarkan Prestasi (SNBP) adalah seleksi masuk perguruan tinggi negeri yang dilakukan berdasarkan hasil penelusuran prestasi akademik melalui rapor serta portofolio akademik dan non akademik siswa.

SNBT adalah singkatan dari Seleksi Nasional Berbasis Tes merupakan seleksi yang dilakukan berdasarkan hasil nilai Tes Skolastik yang berbasis komputer. Materi yang akan diujikan pada SNBT adalah Tes Potensi Skolastik (TPS) dan Tes Literasi yang terdiri dari tujuh subtes, antara lain: 
Kemampuan Penalaran Umum 
Kemampuan Kuantitatif 
Pengetahuan dan Pemahaman Umum 
Kemampuan Memahami Bacaan dan Menulis 
Penalaran Matematika 
Literasi Bahasa Indonesia 
Literasi Bahasa Inggris

With your strong interest in social and human aspects, you will likely find the right place in majors such as Political Science, Accounting, Management, Economics, Communication Studies, International Relations, Law, Psychology, and Literature. Your strong inclination towards social life makes you well suited to exploring and developing yourself in these areas. Enjoy exploring and achieving success in the dynamic academic world!

A passionate person with a hobby of calculating and enthusiastic about solving problems analytically, the world of Science and Technology seems to present the ideal stage for you! Majors such as Medicine, Midwifery, Nursing, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Computer Engineering, and various branches of Engineering (Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial, Electrical) are where your abilities will shine. With your expertise and interest in the world of technology, you will feel truly "at home" and able to show off your skills in exploring various aspects of science and innovation. Good luck on your challenging academic journey!

string-array.name: major_recomendation_question
string-array.item: When you feel tired or stressed, how do you deal with it? taking time alone or seeking interaction with others to feel better?
When you have to make a big decision, how do you make that decision? rely on logic and analysis or your intuition?
When you are in a conflict, how do you resolve it? Prioritize feelings or logic, facts and data?
When you have a tight schedule, how do you handle it? Would you rather live your day more flexibly or create a structured plan?
